'''Jianqiu''' is an open-world [[NPC]] found near the [[Teleport Waypoint]] at [[Stone Gate]]. He can be found sitting with [[Huachu]], drinking [[Pops Zhou]]'s tea.

</gallery>

==Profile==
<!-- detailed story/lore information goes here -->
Jianqiu was an arithmetic teacher at Chihu Rock.  He now introduces himself as an Assistant Shopkeeper of Minghua Bank.

He is currently accompanying [[Huachu]] on a "confidential" business trip&mdash;though [[Gentry De'an|Gentry De'an's]] message on the [[Feiyun Slope Bulletin Board#N|Feiyun Slope Bulletin Board]] suggests that Huachu has faked her death with Jianqiu's help, with the intent of eloping with her lover.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Jianqiu:''' Hi, what's up?
:{{DIcon}} Are you traveling?
::'''Jianqiu:''' I'm going with this young lady on a big once-in-a-lifetime trip.
:{{DIcon}} Who are you?
::'''Jianqiu:''' I taught arithmetic at [[Chihu Rock]] for a few years, where my students were all kids from poor families.
::'''Jianqiu:''' Now I work at the [[Minghua Bank]] as Assistant Shopkeeper.
::'''Jianqiu:''' I am accompanying this young lady on her travels to make sure she stays safe.
::{{DIcon}} Where are you going?
::'''Jianqiu:''' Dunno, maybe [[Celestia]].
::'''Jianqiu:''' Heh. Just joking. I'm not supposed to let people know where we're headed, I'm afraid, sorry about that.
:{{DIcon}} Bon voyage.
::'''Jianqiu:''' With any luck, it will be. Thanks! Same to you.
{{Dialogue End}}
